titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the William H. Tanaka papers, MS0759.UA
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-11 11:32:50 -0500.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.abstract: William H.Tanaka graduated from The George Washington Univeristy Law School (J.D., 1953) and his papers relate to U.S.-Japan trade relations. This collection is not processed to any level and may not be available for research. Please contact University Archives for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: William H. Tanaka papers, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the University Archives by the widow of Mr. Tanaka in 1996.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: William H.Tanaka graduated from The George Washington Univeristy Law School (J.D., 1953) and his papers relate to U.S.-Japan trade relations.
The collection was donated to the University Archives by the widow of Mr. Tanaka in 1996.
N.B. This history note was written in 2005.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is not processed to any level and may not be available for research. Please contact University Archives for more information.
